text:
Hmm... The more I look at it,
the more impressive this schedule looks.

No, seriously, It's incredible to
create something like this on poster paper.

To include schedules for five people and ensure
everyone can move efficiently without overloading them...

...It's quite an undertaking.
It must have been tough to make, right?
Scheduling is my strong suit, after all.

Haha, I figured as much.
Just looking at this, it's evident.

...Natsuha, you're amazing.
I almost want you to check my schedule too.

You know, sometimes
You push yourself too hard.

To ensure you don't push yourself too much,
should I check your schedule for you?

N-No...
I know I just said that, but even so, that's a bit...

...But it's true that to tackle tasks with all your might,
You need a schedule that doesn't overwhelm you.

If you don't factor in breaks and plan your accordingly,
Nobody can keep running at full speed all the time.

...Yeah, you're right.
I'll keep that in mind.
